comments.body: That's what money is for
Tag This as Announced
We Have a SpongeBob SquarePants Adventure Map Bro
Yes
Also forgot to mention, we paid for custom skins so please give us the ability to use it offline.

I agree.  I'm really frustrated by this.  I don't intend to spend any more money on Minecraft in anyway until they address this.  I am a paying customer and I want access to the items that I paid for even if I'm offline.  I should be able to use my paid content even if I don't have internet access!! I live in a rural area where internet access is not always possible.

There is no real reason for this to be such a problem. Skins should be downloaded and saved locally once they are paid for along with other paid content.

Again, no more money to the Minecraft store until I can use what I pay for offline.
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Weird air air l-line line ooo reeeeee line line line

Please! Also our skins that we've purchased, there should be some way to save them locally for offline on the device and user where you've logged in before. Not everyone has access to internet every time of the year, and there's so many players who desire customization being readily available for everyone.

Why can‚Äôt we just customize our capes, like we can with the rest of our skin? My custom skin kinda needs its own elytra design, which can only be obtained by activating a cape. (Tell you what, I guess the capes are more like trophies, so of course you can only get them under certain conditions, but there should be more circumstances where you can get a cape as well.)
True

The reason they don't have more capes that are easier to get is because capes are supposed be to exclusive trophies for those select few who go to certain events and stuff, so they feel special or whatever... having a customizable cape that can be edited like a player skin (in reply to one of the comments) would ruin that exclusivity.

However, I think they should have a generic cape that you can choose the color of using a color wheel/box, but the symbols on the cape are exclusive to events, so those lucky few who get them can still enjoy their special capes.

Yes! I agree.

This wouldn't ruin exclusivity, as certain symbols and textures could be exclusive while everything else isn't. I imagine it wouldn't be difficult to tell that a cape is special if the non-exclusive ones were more simplified.
Perhaps certain capes for completing different lineups of achievements?
Just brought bedwars for me and my daughter to play, just loads us both to the same bed and that's it.... Pretty let down... Seeing a world before buying would be much better

This post needs more attention its so frustrating when you get scammed when its your first time buying something from marketplace.

I agree. Especially when you find something you have been trying to find for soooo long and you finally find it but can't get because you spent your precious minecoins on something that you could have done by yourself in your own world! And of course it might come to attention that we could then just keep trading things for other things on the marketplace and use whatvever there is on the marketplace, so just make it like if you want to give back a purchase on the marketplace you only recieve 50% of your minecoins back. Please mojang, take this into consideration because I know that not only will it benefit the whole of the Minecraft community but will also be an oppurtunity for more people around the world to play because of how people would want something on the marketplace and know that if they've made a wrong decision in purchasing an item and will not be frustrated by this because of how they can trade back an unwanted item for an item that they want. Love the game, and good luck with the update.

Perhaps a Kitsune could also be part of the mashup? Kitsune are supposed to be mystical beings capable of both playful and mischievous natures. They can turn into female humans but it would be strictly within village borders, otherwise in the other wild biome locations the Kitsune would remain a Kitsune.

Note: a Kitsune is a fox, multi-tailed creature. The more tails a Kitsune has the longer it has lived. There are some tales saying Kitsune can live as human women by choice, and they can leave humanity by choice to return to being a Kitsune.
Plus, if Microsoft somehow gains full ownership of the IP, then we could finally have merchandise.

Diamond Tycoon is a great map, and if you did not like it, it is just your personal experience. There are plenty of things to do in the map: fight, mine, collect, complete tasks. We enjoyed this map as a family. Absolutely great value for six dollars.

Another question is that personal dislike is a valid concern and it would be nice to know in advance what the gameplay is. Maybe introducing a trial for paid content.
